alert.note: Alert for Ceiba; Fajardo; Luquillo; Naguabo (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 03 at 3:18AM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 AM AST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Ceiba, Fajardo, Luquillo and Naguabo. * WHEN...Until 530 AM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. River or stream flows are elevated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 218 AM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms and bands of strong showers moving across these areas. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Fajardo, Naguabo, Luquillo, Ceiba, Aguas Claras, Ramos, Luis M. Cintron, Roosevelt Roads, Playa Fortuna, Duque, Daguao, Rio Blanco and Pena Pobre. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
